synopsis.text: Playtime draws to a close as the clock strikes five, marking the beginning of an elusive period that lies between the end of play and the start of dinner at home. This anime, a graduate work from the Tokyo University of the Arts in 2013, was created by Saki Muramoto in the Department of Animation, Graduate School of Film and New Media. The story revolves around this unique, indefinable time, inviting viewers to explore the subtle intricacies of everyday life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
